gw.plugin.system

Interface ITestingClock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, IStartablePlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ITestingClock
extends IStartablePlugin
    Defines a pluggable interface for getting/setting the system time. The purpose of this plugin interface is to facilitate testing date-sensitive operations. In production, this plugin should not be enabled.
    Author:
    pdalbora

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getCurrentTime()
      Gets the current time, in milliseconds.
      void setCurrentTime(long time)
      Sets the current time, in milliseconds.

      • Methods inherited from interface gw.api.startable.IStartablePlugin

        getState, start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentTime

        long getCurrentTime()
        Gets the current time, in milliseconds.

      • setCurrentTime

        void setCurrentTime(long time)
        Sets the current time, in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the current time cannot be set to the given time.
